Title: Slugan (platformer)
Description: Made in Construct. Personal contribution: music and programming.
One of the best projects of the semester (scored 9 or higher).

Title: Slugan II (vertical shoot'em up)
Description: Made in Python with pygame, contributed with programming and SFX (using BFXR).
Used the Tiled file format to build the stages.
For the 2nd time one of the best projects of the semester

Title: Slugan 3 (endless runner)
Description: Made in Java with libGDX, desktop and Android versions, contribution: music, SFX and programming.
Once again one of the best projects of the semester.
Delivered a working mobile version with touch controls
